name: Butterfly Mystery House
description:
Hi, We are delighted to share our new game with you :)

Game Name: Butterfly Mystery House

Description:   The door is locked and you have trapped alone with butterfly puzzles. Find the useful clue and objects to assist you to find the door key and escape from there. Good Luck and Have Fun!

Game Page: http://www.freeroomescape.com/butterfly-mystery-house/

Walkthrough: 

Thanks for supporting our game, we will continue to make more fun and addicting free games :)

Cheers,

Free Room Escape
